metadata.title: CVE-2016-4303 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The parse_string function in cjson.c in the cJSON library mishandles UTF8/16 strings, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or execute arbitrary code via a non-hex character in a JSON string, which triggers a heap-based buffer overflow. It was discovered that iperf mishandled certain UTF8 and UTF16 strings. A remote attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: iperf3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.3-1').
